SECTION 05 50 00 — METAL FABRICATIONS

PART 1 — GENERAL

1.01 SUMMARY
A. Section includes:
   1. Steel railings and handrails
   2. Steel pipe guardrails
   3. Miscellaneous steel fabrications
   4. Steel stairs
   5. Ornamental iron gates
   6. Bollards

1.02 RELATED SECTIONS
A. Section 03 30 00 — Cast-in-Place Concrete: Embed plates and anchor bolts cast into concrete.
B. Section 05 12 00 — Structural Steel Framing: Primary structural steel by others.
C. Section 09 91 00 — Painting: Field touch-up of shop-primed surfaces.

1.03 REFERENCES
A. ASTM A36/A36M — Standard Specification for Carbon Structural Steel
B. ASTM A500/A500M — Standard Specification for Cold-Formed Welded and Seamless Carbon Steel Structural Tubing
C. ASTM A53/A53M — Standard Specification for Pipe, Steel
D. ASTM A123/A123M — Standard Specification for Zinc (Hot-Dip Galvanized) Coatings on Iron and Steel Products

1.04 SUBMITTALS
A. Shop Drawings: Submit for review prior to fabrication. Include all dimensions, connections, and material specifications.
B. Product Data: Submit for each type of manufactured component.

PART 2 — PRODUCTS

2.01 MATERIALS
A. Steel shapes, plates, and bars: ASTM A36
B. Steel tubing: ASTM A500, Grade B
C. Steel pipe: ASTM A53, Type E or S, Grade B
D. Stainless steel: AISI Type 304

2.02 FASTENERS
A. Bolts: ASTM A325, hot-dip galvanized where exposed
B. Anchors: Hilti HIT-HY 200 adhesive anchors or approved equal

PART 3 — EXECUTION

3.01 STAIR 1 — GROUND FLOOR TO SECOND FLOOR
A. Provide steel stair with the following:
   1. Total rise: 12'-0"
   2. Width: 44" clear
   3. Stringers: MC10x8.4
   4. Treads: 1/4" diamond plate, 11" run
   5. Risers: Open
   6. Landings: 1 intermediate platform at mid-height, 5'-0" x 4'-6"
   7. Railing: Both sides, 42" high, 1-1/2" round top rail, vertical pickets at 4" o.c.
   8. Finish: Hot-dip galvanized per ASTM A123
   See Detail S-301

3.02 ORNAMENTAL IRON RAILING — STAIR 2
A. Provide ornamental iron railing:
   1. Linear footage: Approximately 65 LF
   2. Height: 42"
   3. Top rail: 1-1/2" square tube
   4. Infill: 1/2" square bar vertical pickets at 4" o.c.
   5. Posts: 2" square tube at 5'-0" o.c., surface mount
   6. Finish: Powder coat, color to be selected by architect
   See Detail A-12

3.03 CANTILEVER GATE — PARKING ENTRANCE
A. Provide cantilever sliding gate:
   1. Clear opening: 16'-0"
   2. Height: 6'-0"
   3. Frame: 2" square tube
   4. Infill: Expanded metal
   5. Electric operator: LiftMaster CSW24U or approved equal
   6. Finish: Powder coat black
   See Detail S-105

3.04 BOLLARDS — MAIN ENTRANCE
A. Provide (6) fixed bollards:
   1. Pipe: 6" schedule 40
   2. Height above grade: 36"
   3. Embed: 24" below grade in concrete footing
   4. Finish: Powder coat safety yellow
   5. Protective HDPE sleeve cover

3.05 MISCELLANEOUS METALS
A. Provide miscellaneous embed plates, connection brackets, and support angles as indicated on structural drawings. See sheets S-100 through S-115.

END OF SECTION 05 50 00
